root.name: Unpleasant Horse
root.description: OverviewThat white horse is about to F-ed up.Unpleasant Horse was the result of PopCap's first ever "Game Jam" contest, where teams of employees draw a randomly generated name from a hat and try to create a game around it in less than 24 hours. The name that was drawn was "Unpleasant Horse Racing in the Sky". The game took a few more weeks to polish, but it is essentially the same game that was birthed from that hat.GameplayThe players tap on the screen to direct their lean, mean steed. Tap on clouds to stay in the air and tap on other horses to cut off their wings and send them to their death via strategically placed meat grinders.
